EmailTemplate.description: Quote inquiry - new portal account setup required
EmailTemplate.name: Quote Inquiry
EmailTemplate.subject: Quote Inquiry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {contact.firstname},
Thank you for contacting Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support.
We'd like to tell you about our new quoting system that will make this process you just used a thing of the past.
Honeywell has shifted from an email-based quoting system to an easy, fast portal-based system.
But before you can submit your online quote request, you'll need to set up a portal account.
Simply log into the MyAerospace.com portal and register as a new user. When your account is ready, you'll receive an email confirmation to start using the system.
Questions?
Here's a quick tutorial on how to set up your portal account.
Thank you. We appreciate your business! Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support
